name: WindBots
description:
Controls

Welcome to the lab! Your task is to test cute tiny wind-up robots.

- Complete puzzles by getting one bot to the goal.
- Their mechanisms run for only 10 second - we had to compromise to fit in gravity generators that let them freeze in space!
- The bots can record your every input and play it back.

Good luck!

Controls:

made by team ToxicOtter
